notesStmt.note: "Of the faith of infants, and how they are iustified and saued" and "Not consent of fathers but Scripture the ground of faith. Written by the occasion of a conference had with Mr. Bayly" each has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous. The latter work is addressed to M. Bayly.
Includes a verse translation of: Muret, Marc-Antoine. Institutio puerilis.
Reissued as "The works of that reverend divine M. John Downe", but in fact a selection.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
